jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
The Growth Lead will work closely with their Growth Manager and collaborate with Growth and Product Analysts, Product Manager, Marketing, Research, and Creative to execute solutions focused on improving acquisition, activation, retention, or loyalty for our every Product. The ideal candidate is a data-driven business person which equal parts of Growth Marketer, Product Analyst, and Business Strategist. They start from business strategy, customer experience and delve into writing campaign briefs or experiment designs that encourage our users to experience the Product’s core value as quickly as possible. We're looking for someone who gets out of bed every day thinking about new ways to grow the business, and who works in exponents vs. increments.

Ideal candidates are process-oriented, results-driven, and problem-solving self-starters. They have a strong sense of responsibility and ownership. They have experience with loyalty, incentives and have strategic ideas on driving consumer experience via user psychology, UI/UX changes, gamification, and content marketing. This role will provide an opportunity to greatly impact the homepage of GO-JEK and how we personalize user experiences globally.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Discover growth opportunities in the product from funnel conversion rates and user experience by exploring transaction data, customer activity within apps and actual customer insights
  • Drives the prioritization, strategy, and focus on solutions to solve user problems
  • Testing and validate solutions through proper experimentation process
  • Plan and scale-up solutions which consist of content, communication, vouchers, and promotion or product changes
  • Deliver with high attention to detail and accuracy
  • Summarize results and communicate learnings to the product team
  • Take ownership of KPIs related to activation, engagement, or retention within the product funnel by maximizing user acquisition and conversion rates

• BS/MS in Business, Engineering, Computer Science, Math, Economics, Statistics, or equivalent experience
  • Familiarity with project management tools (e.g. Trello, Favro, Jira)
  • A creative design-thinking and problem-solving mindset that can work in increments and exponents
  • Good knowledge of SQL and basic experimentation process
  • Proficiency with multiple analytic and database tools common within a marketing organization (e.g., Clevertap, Tableau, etc.)
  • Balance attention to detail with swift execution
  • Hustle is essential, moving quickly and executing to allow for continual iteration is a core competency of our team
  • Working experience in related field (growth and experimentation related job) is a plus
